data.summary: The website demonstrates moderate AI readiness with a score of 75.8. While some categories perform well, improvements are needed in several areas for better AI optimization.

top_5_critical_items: Limited citation signals reduce AI trustworthiness.
Missing meta descriptions affect AI platform visibility.
Poor heading structure impacts LLM content chunking.
data.llm_visibility_assessment: Moderate AI discoverability. Content is partially LLM-friendly, but lacks structured signals and source credibility to earn consistent citations or summaries in AI platforms.
